titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND CODE - Description

div.p: ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND CODE Â is the same as attribute ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND.

p.b: Use in the Future Outpatient CDS:

div.p: Where the attendance is in the future (and has not been cancelled) use value 0 (zero) - not applicable - APPOINTMENT occurs in the future.

Where the future attendance has been
cancelled , use the appropriate value from the national codes (see ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND).
For specific National Code usage in different data sets, see ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND.
